entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. High 20. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Showers beginning before morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers at times heavy. High 14.
